cv.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
cv.summary: With +10 years of experience, I have gained expertise in designing, building, and maintaining scalable applications. My skill set includes Java/Spring Boot, Angular and different databases, excelling in microservices, API development, and DevOps practices. I have contributed to diverse industries, delivering high-quality, user-focused solutions that integrate seamlessly with complex systems.

proxymed.description: Led the analysis, build and maintenance of several applications, integration with different third-party APIs

engie.projects: B2B and B2C APIs / Official Engie Website
engie.description: Building/Updating Microservices with SAP & SalesForce integration, ensuring all systems are connected and communicating correctly via SOAP/REST/Kafka

spf.projects: Legal documents API / Criminal Record system (CRS)
spf.description: Led the development of a documents platform integrated with SharePoint, overseeing architecture, implementation, and deployment / Introduce new features and fix performance issues in the CRS

vts.description: Developing REST endpoints and a new intermediate API to collect weather and navigation data from various connected systems, and presenting this data on a supervisory platform built with Angular

parliament.projects: Election result management tool / Quality Management information system
parliament.description: Led the upgrade of a legacy Java application to support new REST standards, add new REST endpoints and presenting the result of calculations via a newly created angular application

total.description: Analyse & develop new requirements and ensure that all the systems are up and running efficiently

engie_morocco.description: Analysis and development according to business requirements of different REST endpoints with SAP and Salesforce integration via SOAP services

credit_agricole.projects: Credit management solution (CMS) / Invoice purchase control system (ECAF) / Industrialisation of project management data
credit_agricole.description: Analyse, modeling, and development of features according to business requirements, Integration of data flows coming from ABAP systems, Integration of data coming from different systems into a single decision making platform

contact.cta_description: I'm always open to discussing exciting new opportunities and innovative projects.
